name: Distaster run
description:
Description: You wake up and then everything escalates. You end up on a hoverboard trying to get away before the battery runs out, find new ones in the city.

Controls:

WASD + Mouse look

Team:

Emil Eldstål (Modelling/Shaders/Level Design/Blueprints)
